column4: I don't know how kdm could even slip into stable in it's current state
good for you. many people are having problems with it though
go to launchpad.net and search for kdm and you'll see
the ubuntu default version as well as the updated one from kubuntu.org
does sudo /etc/init.d/kdm restart work properly for you?
> I'm at gdm at the moment :) Trying to get kompiz to work :)
good. I still wouldn't call it stable with all those bug reports though
mwe> I don't start it on boot :)
personally I don't think "it works for 90%" is good enough
I guess you can hear I'm kinda angry with it
